name: Jones (itch) (Hunzzzo)
description:
Jones is on a journey to explore the ruins and collect treasures that are hidden in the ruins. Look out for hidden secrets in the ruins and try to collect all of the treasures scattered in the ruins.

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Move to the left

S - Drop down from platforms

D - Move to the right

SPACE - Attack / Shoot

Credits to:

Sam Baquir

Allenski for the pixel art assets

Itch.io page: https://allenski.itch.io

Twitter page: @alllenski
